renderer::FramebufferStatus

renderer::FramebufferStatus Namespace Reference

Status of framebuffer.


Enumerations

enum  {
  FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE, FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_ATTACHMENT, FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_MISSING_ATTACHMENT, FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_DIMENSIONS,
  FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_FORMATS, FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_DRAW_BUFFER, FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_READ_BUFFER, FRAMEBUFFER_UNSUPPORTED
}

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE  Everything is ok.
FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_ATTACHMENT  There is (are) incomplete attachment(s).
FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_MISSING_ATTACHMENT  There are no attachments.
FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_DIMENSIONS  Attachments have different dimensions.
FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_FORMATS  Attachments have different BPP format.
FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_DRAW_BUFFER  Not enough color attachments for all draw buffers.
FRAMEBUFFER_INCOMPLETE_READ_BUFFER  Not enough color attachments for read buffer.
FRAMEBUFFER_UNSUPPORTED  Format combinations are not supported by hardware.
